section.name: flex:compile
section.p: Flex compile mojo to generate .swc or/and .swf file on Flex SDK 2 & 3. A forked java process will be created to do Flex compilation. JVM arguments and additional arguments could be specified if needed. Note: The plugin will check the output file and sources files to determine if source is up to date or it should be re-generated.

ul.li: Requires a Maven 2.0 project to be executed.

tr.td: Home location of Flex SDK 2 or 3, please checking the existance of lib/mxmlc.jar and lib/compc.jar and lib/xercesImpl.jar
additional arguments to be passed at the end of command line to build Flex
Artifact classifier Default value is: flex2.
swf dependencies, which will be used to generate html template files and .swf files will be copied to the war source directory
Skip the Flex build or not. If not enabled, then the build will be skipped Default value is: true.
Flex configuration file for Flex compiler.
JVM arguments for forked java process

Flex build parameters in the format of below (within configuration):
<configuration> ... <parameters> <locale>en_US<locale> <include-classes> <class>com.site.A</class> <class>com.site.B</class> ... </include-classes> <include-file>file.png com/site/image/file.png</include-file> <include-file>folder.png com/site/image/folder.png</include-file> <publisher>site.com</publisher> <-- <dump-config>flex-config</dump-config> --> <benchmark/> </parameters> ... </configuration>
as shown above, following parameters will be added into the command line:
-locate en_US -include-classes com.site.A,com.site.B,... -include-file file.png com/site/image/file.png -include-file folder.png com/site/image/folder.png ... -publisher site.com -benchmark
Source file (for example, .mxml/.css). It's required for swf compilation. Default value is: ${project.build.sourceDirectory}/main.mxml.
